remarks: Eliminate a hypothesis containing 2 class variables.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1999.)
statement:
elimhyp2v.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
elimhyp2v.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , B , D ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
elimhyp2v.3 $e |- ( C = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ta <-> et ) ) $.
elimhyp2v.4 $e |- ( D = if ( ph , B , D ) -> ( et <-> th ) ) $.
elimhyp2v.5 $e |- ta $.
elimhyp2v $p |- th $.
